Introduction


PURETTY (Pure+Pretty) (Korean: 퓨리티) was a South Korean girl group active both in South Korea and Japan. They were created along with Prizmmy☆ and promoted through the joint Japanese-Korean anime series, Pretty Rhythm Dear My Future. Which was a sequel to Pretty Rhythm Aurora Dream. The series was an attempt to launch the franchise to a South Korean audience. PURETTY made their Japanese debut through the tv show where the members were featured as fictionalised versions of themselves.
